about.title: About
about.description: Passionate software engineer with expertise in building scalable web applications and cloud solutions. Strong background in full-stack development, with a focus on modern technologies and best practices. Committed to writing clean, maintainable code and delivering high-quality solutions.

job1.title: Senior Software Engineer
job1.resp1: Led development of microservices architecture serving 1M+ users
job1.resp2: Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 60%
job1.resp3: Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews
job1.resp4: Improved application performance by 40% through optimization

job2.title: Software Engineer
job2.resp1: Developed and maintained full-stack web applications using React and Node.js
job2.resp2: Collaborated with cross-functional teams in Agile environment
job2.resp3: Integrated third-party APIs and payment systems
job2.resp4: Participated in architecture decisions and technical planning

job3.title: Junior Developer
job3.resp1: Built responsive web interfaces using modern JavaScript frameworks
job3.resp2: Worked on RESTful API development and database design
job3.resp3: Participated in daily standups and sprint planning

degree1.name: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
degree1.description: Focus on Software Engineering, Data Structures, and Algorithms. Final project on distributed systems.

footer.text: Thank you for reviewing my CV. I look forward to discussing opportunities with you.
